title: I don't want to make a role today, I'm going on strike

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Boycott somebody at night, stopping their ability from having any effects (they still visit)
- Go on strike against the town, preventing ALL town abilities from having any effect tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are executed, the next day the poll workers go on strike, and there is no execution that day.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 4783
*"When do we get a break from the endless grind of creating roles..."*
